attributes.action: abolish Ian Lucas's (Wrexham MP) idea to change the Union Flag.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ian Lucas (MP for Wrexham)wants to abolish the current union flag, and replace it with a flag containing the three colours, but with a Welsh dragon in the center. Would the money and time spent on this change (should it happen) be better spent on free prescriptions, university places, and better public services etc.

Sign this petition and stop the dim-witted idiots who want to change triavial things for changes sake.

rejection.details: An idea cannot be abolished. You may raise a petition calling for the union flag to remain as it is.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
